text: Alexander Akmaldinov (born June 23, 1994) is a Kazakhstani-born Russian professional ice hockey centre who is currently playing for Yugra Khanty- Mansiysk of the Supreme Hockey League. He previously played in the Kontinental Hockey League for Yugra and HC Sochi.Profile at KHL.ru Akmaldinov made his KHL debut with Yugra Khanty-Mansiysk during the 2015–16 KHL season. He signed with HC Spartak Moscow on September 8, 2015, but was released just three months later without ever playing a game for Spartak and he returned to Yugra. On October 20, 2017, Akmaldinov moved to HC Sochi.Sochi Makes Three Exchanges (in Russian) He was released from his contract by mutual consent on August 25, 2019.Sochi and Alexander Akmaldinov terminate contract by agreement of the parties (in Russian) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Dizel Penza players Category:Kazakhstani ice hockey players Category:Mamonty Yugry players Category:Rubin Tyumen players Category:Russian ice hockey centres Category:HC Ryazan players Category:HC Sochi players Category:Sportspeople from Oskemen Category:HC Yugra players Category:Yuzhny Ural Orsk players
title: Alexander Akmaldinov
